steps.name: def randomString = function(s){ return s + Math.floor(Math.random() * 100000) }

steps.name: def token = response.token
comments: # O token vem dentro do campo "token"

steps.name: match token == '#present'
comments: # Valida que o token não é nulo

steps.name: def result = { token: token, userId: userId, username: username }
comments: # 4. Retornar as variáveis para quem chamou (o bookstore.feature)

steps.name: def bookSchema = { isbn: '#string', title: '#string', subTitle: '##string', author: '#string', publish_date: '#present', publisher: '#string', pages: '#number', description: '#string', website: '#string' }
